GameClient - Class in client
Main class on the client-side, which creates core objects and stores state.

Constructor of this class.
GameEngine - Class in server
This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.

Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
GameServer - Class in server
Main class on the server-side which manages the game-logic and listens/accepts client connections.
GameServer() - Constructor for class server.GameServer
Create the game and initialize its internal map.
getClientHandlers(Player) - Static method in class server.GameServer
Returns the ClientHandlers for those handlers whose player objects is currently the same room as Player p's current room or previous room.
getCmdReturnMsg() - Method in class server.entities.Player
Returns a message from the previous command, if there was none null is returned to signal this.
getCommand(String) - Method in class server.Parser
Factory method for Commands, uses dynamic class loading.

Returns damage of this entity.

getEnemies() - Method in class server.Room
Returns enemies contained within this room.
getExit(String) - Method in class server.Room

getIsDead() - Method in class server.entities.Entity

getItems() - Method in class server.Room
Returns items contained within this room.

Return a long description of this room, in the form: You are in the kitchen.

getParser() - Static method in class server.Parser
Singleton pattern, returns the one and only Parser object, if null - create it first.

Return a long description of this room, in the form: You see in the kitchen.
